mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (productname, standard, unit, price, brand, userid, expirationdate, alcohol_level, hashtag, photopath, category) VALUES (#{productname}, #{standard}, #{unit}, #{price}, #{brand}, #{userid}, #{expirationdate}, #{alcohol_level}, #{hashtag}, #{photopath}, #{category})
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET productname=#{productname}, standard=#{standard}, unit=#{unit}, price=#{price}, brand=#{brand}, userid=#{userid}, expirationdate=#{expirationdate}, alcohol_level=#{alcohol_level}, hashtag=#{hashtag}, photopath=#{photopath}, category=#{category} WHERE pid = #{pid}
